news_header: A significant Mayan city named Valeriana has been discovered in Mexico, alongside various news events including protests in Argentina and a plane crash in Brazil.
news_text: Archaeologists have uncovered a large Mayan city called Valeriana in Campeche, Mexico, featuring pyramids and sports fields. In other news, Evo Morales claims survival from an assassination attempt, a former One Direction star has died in Argentina, and protests in Buenos Aires against pension reforms have escalated. Additionally, a plane crash in São Paulo resulted in 61 fatalities, and opposition protests are occurring in various locations. A solar eclipse was visible in Chile and Argentina, and uncontacted indigenous people were spotted in Peru amidst logging activities.
